entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
